subject: Public Speaking
title: Trials and Obstacles
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Trials and Obstacles.

hook.text: The hero faces obstacles. Each one teaches something new.

buildup.text: In speeches, obstacles create relatability. Audiences face them too.

discovery.text: Describe specific obstacles with sensory detail.

twist.text: Generic obstacles bore. Specific ones engage.

climax.text: Obstacles reveal character. How did you respond?

punchline.text: Obstacles make stories real. Don't skip them.

quiz.question: Why are obstacles important?
options: They create relatability and reveal character
